t: Amazon.com: Potastic EP6 10-in-1 Programmable Electric Pressure Cooker,6 Quart,LCD Display,Instant Cooking with Stainless Steel Pot, Multi-use for Rice,Yogurt,Egg,Sauté,steam, silver: Home & Kitchen
s: I was excited to start cooking once the Potastic arrived. The first time went amazing! The second night was a total flop, the lid would never seal even though I used it the same exact way and tried all the trouble shooting issues...nothing! There isn’t a easy way to get ahold of customer service and never received a response back. Such a disappointment since the first night went well. Wish I had bought the instapot brand ...
